title: Espresso
content: Concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee, bolder than brewed coffee.

title: Ristretto
content: A short shot of espresso, using less water and producing a more concentrated flavor.

title: Foamed Milk
content: Milk that has been aerated to create a light, frothy texture for drinks like cappuccinos.

title: Steamed Milk
content: Milk heated with steam to create a creamy texture, used in lattes and other drinks.
